issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: In testcase testEnableAndDisableErasureCodingPolicy in TestDistributedFileSystem.java, when enable or disable an ErasureCodingPolicy, we should query from enabledPoliciesByName other than policiesByName to Check whether this policy has been set up successfully.
